alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 23 at 1:27PM MST until November 24 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 11 PM MST FRIDAY ABOVE 7500 FEET... * WHAT...Periods of snow, heavy at times, with total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Greater amounts are possible over the highest elevations. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Kaibab Plateau above 7500 feet. This includes Jacob Lake. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 11 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Poor travel conditions are expected due to slick roads and reduced visibility. Snow forecast from 5 AM Friday to 11 PM Friday: Jacob Lake 3 to 5 inches
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
